title: Improve Security Documentation and Search Experience

labels.name: kind/epic
labels.description: Large issue with links to sub-issues

body:
### Epic Tasks

- [x] [#20622](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/20622) Improve Security Search Experience in Quarkus Guides
- [ ] [#20625](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/20625) Provide Hierarchical Guides View
- [x] [#10049](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/25989) LDAP Security Guide points to a non-existent quickstart demo
- [x] [#20626](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/20626) Improve OIDC service and web-app documentation
- [x] [#20627](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/20627) Create Getting Started With Security quickstart
- [x] [#20736](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/20736) Split the JWT guide into JWT and JWT Build guides
- [x] [#21285](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/21285) Improve OidcClient docs
- [ ] [#21075](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/21075) Create Security Guide Flow Diagram
- [x] [#21521](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/21521) Explain how to login to most of well known social providers

### Analysis

In progress - see https://groups.google.com/g/quarkus-dev/c/Tn0bJ_XFmkQ
